description:
Task: Duplicate elimination
Write a function remove_extras(lst) that takes in a list and returns a new list with all repeated occurrences of any element removed. For example, remove_extras([5, 2, 1, 2, 3]) returns the list [5, 2, 1, 3].
sample_correct_code_blocks:
def remove_extras ( lst ) :
    i = 0
    new = [ ]
    while ( i < len ( lst ) ) :
        curr = lst [ i ]
        new += [ curr ]
        for ele in lst :
            if ( ele == curr ) :
                continue
            new += [ ele ]
        lst = new . copy ( )
        new = [ ]
        i += 1
    lst . reverse ( )
    return lst
gpt_rep_code:
def remove_extras ( lst ) :
    i = 0
    new = [ ]
    while ( i < len ( lst ) ) :
        curr = lst [ i ]
        new += [ curr ]
        for ele in lst :
            if ( ele == curr ) :
                continue
            new += [ ele ]
        lst = new . copy ( )
        new = [ ]
        i += 1
    lst . reverse ( )
    return lst
